title: BrownBeat Photo Companion to Hampi
description: The BrownBeat Photo Companion to Hampi provides almost 90 stunning photos of the abandoned magical city of Hampi in Southern India. This eBook takes you on a visual journey of the ruins, accompanied by a generous amount of descriptions of each site and each photo. Gateways, pavilions, carvings, the natural landscape, statues, temples, shrines and more are shown from key sites in Hampi such as the Virupaksha Temple, Hampi Bazaar, Achyutaraya Temple, Vithala Temple, Hemakuta Hill Ganesha Statues, Lakshmi Narasimha statue, Badavilinga Temple, Soolai Bazaar and the Royal Citadel.
author: Richard Brown
